name: ToneDen Shortcode
author: ToneDen, Inc.

sections.description:
ToneDen is the easiest way to turn anonymous website visitors into real customers.
This plugin makes installation of the widget a simple one-step process.
sections.installation:
1. Download lasso.zip from WordPress, and unzip it.
  2. Upload the lasso/trunk directory from the unzipped folder to your site’s /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Create a ToneDen account at www.toneden.io/signup, then visit
    www.toneden.io/lasso/campaign and set up your Lasso embed.
  5. Go to www.toneden.io/lasso/install/wordpress and copy the displayed user ID.
  6. Embed Lasso with shortcode: [lasso user_id=<your user ID>].
sections.faq:
This is too technical! Help.

Feel free to email us at support (at) toneden.io if you need any help setting
up Lasso.

What’s ToneDen?

Good question. We help you gather data on your customers and fans and use that
data to market your content more effectively.

short_description: Enables shortcode to embed ToneDen's widget in WordPress blogs.
